line.text: What potions have I drunk of Siren tears
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Distilled from limbecks foul as hell within
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Applying fears to hopes and hopes to fears
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Still losing when I saw my self to win
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: What wretched errors hath my heart committed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whilst it hath thought it self so blessed never
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How have mine eyes out of their spheres been fitted
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In the distraction of this madding fever
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O benefit of ill now I find true
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That better is by evil still made better
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And ruined love when it is built anew
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Grows fairer than at first more strong far greater
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So I return rebuked to my content
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And gain by ills thrice more than I have spent
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
